alert.note: Alert for Conway; Garland; Perry; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 9:58PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Perry, southwestern Conway, northwestern Garland, central Yell and south central Pope Counties through 1030 PM CST... At 958 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Plainview in Yell County, or 13 miles southeast of Danville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Perryville... Ola... Adona... Carden Bottoms... Petit Jean State Park... Plainview in Yell County... Galla Creek WMA... Casa... Aplin... Birta... Nimrod... Holla Bend... Mt Tabor... Sunlight Bay Park... Cherry Hill in Perry County... Carter Cove Park... Lakeview in Yell County... Deberrie... Pontoon... Centerville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central and western Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Garland; Perry; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest
